config.outdoor.enable.desc: Apply custom lighting to street lamps and windows outside.
config.indoor.enable.desc: Apply custom lighting to lamps inside buildings.
config.indoor.farmhouseonly.desc: If enabled, indoor lighting changes will only happen in your FarmHouse and cabins.
config.nightonly.desc: If enabled, custom effects only activate 2 hours after sunset (adapts to seasons/mods).
config.indoor.excluded.desc: Comma-separated list of Location IDs (e.g., Greenhouse, Cellar) to ignore.
